POTSDAM_HBF.opening:
You are sitting on a bench at the tram station at Potsdam Central Station.
You look at the timetable and see that your tram will arrive in 7 minutes.
You close your eyes and feel the sunlight on your face.
When suddenly…
You remember that you forgot that you didn't got the book from the library after your course.
You need the book to study for next week's exam.
POTSDAM_HBF.query: Do you want to hurry and go get the next train to Golm before the library closes?
POTSDAM_HBF.train:
It seems like you've lost your semester ticket.
You need to buy a ticket to get on the train.
What do you wanna do?

TICKET_AUTOMAT.opening:
Welcome to the ticket machine.
A ticket to Golm and back to the central station costs 5€, but you have to guess the missing word first.

TRAIN_1.opening: Good thing you bought your ticket. Now you can get on the train.

TRAIN_2.opening:
Good job on finding the word!
Sadly you missed the first train, but the second one is here so get on.
TRAIN_2.query: Where do you wanna get to?

TICKET_CONTROL.opening: SURPRISE! You got into a ticket control.
TICKET_CONTROL.query: Do you wanna show your ticket?

FEE.opening:
It seems that you didn't validate your ticket before getting on the train.
You need to pay a 15€ fee.

LIBRARY.opening: You need to hurry! The library will close soon.
LIBRARY.query: Guess the animal and you will get your book.

COFFEE.opening: Here is your coffee, I hope it tastes good.

BOOK.opening: You sit down to read your book.

REPLAY.query: Do you wanna play another round?

EXIT.opening: Good Bye! It was nice playing with you
